trans-unit.source: Represents the options that can be set for an <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以針對設定選項<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> is used to generate XSD schemas from a type or assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>用來從型別或組件產生 XSD 結構描述。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> to generate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] code from a schema document.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter>產生[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]從結構描述文件的程式碼。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] importing and exporting schemas, see [Schema Import and Export](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Exporting Schemas from Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]匯入和匯出結構描述，請參閱[結構描述匯入和匯出](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[匯出類別中的結構描述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A>屬性供<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>來包含物件圖形中的可讀取的型別。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]資料合約和已知型別，請參閱[資料合約已知型別](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]資料合約，請參閱[使用資料合約](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a serialization surrogate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定序列化代理。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate"></xref> interface that can be used to customize how an XML schema representation is exported for a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate"></xref>介面，可以用來自訂特定型別匯出的 XML 結構描述表示的方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合，這些型別可能會在序列化或還原序列化期間遇到。

trans-unit.source: The KnownTypes property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph (set using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property).
trans-unit.target: KnownTypes 屬性供<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>來包含物件圖形中的可讀取的型別 (使用設定<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性)。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]資料合約和已知型別，請參閱[資料合約已知型別](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_KnownTypes" name="KnownTypes" href=""></xref> collection that contains types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_KnownTypes" name="KnownTypes" href=""> </xref>集合，其中包含可能會在序列化或還原序列化期間遇到的型別。

trans-unit.source: XML schema representations are exported for all the types specified in this collection by the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合中由指定的所有類型之 XML 結構描述表示都會匯出<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"> </xref>。
